title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 92-1.7 - Certificate of retention
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 92-1.7 - Certificate of retention

State Regulations

In the event that an approved person or organization discontinues offering course work or training, a record of certifications shall be retained in a manner approved by the department for six years from the date of issuance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
92-1.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
